title: [Large-scale] Intensive Course on Learning Chinese Characters in Sociocultural Contexts Using Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese character recognition, online learning tool experience, foundational understanding of East Asian social structures/historical events/cultural institutions
context.additional_context: Intermediate-level Chinese character learning program tailored to meet the practical needs of working professionals, with a focus on historical document interpretation, intercultural communication, and terminology related to social systems (family systems, administrative structures, legal terms). Learners simultaneously strengthen cultural literacy as citizens and professional expertise in their fields.

learning_goals: Through game-based activities, analyze and explain the components (radicals, stroke order) of 50 essential Chinese characters with 80% accuracy and understand the historical/institutional contexts of East Asian cultural spheres.
Perform digital quizzes and collaborative missions to apply 30 Chinese vocabulary items in contexts related to social hierarchy, economic systems, and political institutions.

Learners will complete a project-based assessment within one week, producing a practical document (report or proposal) of over 100 characters, and analyze the meanings and cultural implications of 20+ Chinese characters included in the document to explain 3+ social systems, cultural practices, or historical contexts.

resources: LMS (Learning Management System) platform (built-in gamification features)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
